home.resume: In the next sections you will discover that I am a decisive person who has the ability to address problematic situations and team work, contributing with my knowledge and experience.

about.title: about me
about.text: I’m a programmer with more of 15 years experience, mainly oriented to web environment and specialized in Java for Backend (Liferay mostly) and React for Frontend

skills: Mentor and guide the development of junior engineers
Drive development practices used within the team
Resolve bugs and improve system performance
Work closely with engineers to architect and develop the best      technical design and approach
Generate ideas with team members and offering solutions
Staying up to date with new technology and teaching other developers how to incorporate new trends
Maintaining an understanding web applications and programming practices
Conferring with team to resolve conflicts, prioritize needs, develop content criteria, or choose solutions
Accomplishes engineering and organization mission by completing related results as needed
Supports and develops software engineers providing advice, coaching, and educational opportunities

services.description: That are some of the services that I offer to provide

services.title: BackEnd Development
services.text: Java development specialized in Liferay or Express

services.title: FullStack Development
services.text: Development and support with Liferay, Java//React or Node/Express/React

services.title: Tech Lead
services.text: Drive Development, Technical Lead and Guidance for software developers

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.description: Here you can see some of the projects that I have worked on in my free time

projects.title: Liferay Portal
projects.description: Liferay Portal is an enterprise portal platform developed by Liferay, Inc. It is a Java-based web application server that runs on a servlet container such as Apache Tomcat or Oracle WebLogic Server. It is a content management system (CMS) and web application framework that can be used to build websites, intranets, and extranets.

projects.title: Liferay Digital Experience Platform
projects.description: Liferay Digital Experience Platform is a complete digital experience platform that helps you create exceptional digital experiences. It is the only solution that unifies content, experience, and commerce on one platform to deliver personalized interactions at scale.

projects.title: Liferay Commerce
projects.description: Liferay Commerce is a complete commerce platform that helps you sell more and sell better. It is the only solution that unifies content, experience, and commerce on one platform to deliver personalized interactions at scale.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: If you have any questions or you want to work with me, don´t hesitate to contact me
